mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT art_id, art_title, SUBSTR(art_join_date,1,10) as art_join_date, art_contents, art_file, art_important, art_hits, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY art_important, art_join_date desc) rn FROM ktds17b.article ) article WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY rn
